thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 59 of 579
thread.title: Dayna Glover

author: Dayna Glover
title: Dayna Glover
text: There is a plus side to limited shopping options, but at the same time, I feel like I'm not getting access to the full catalog of offerings - I had my eye on a specific sweater, but one day it was there, another day it wasn't. Then I finally found it and put it in my cart, then had second thoughts after reading a few reviews that resonated with my finicky skin (itchy, stiff, etc). So, here I am with a different sweatshirt that has great reviews - fingers crossed!
